articles.title: 82 people have tested positive for new mutant variant of SARS-CoV-2 in India: Govt - ETHealthworld.com
articles.description: Their close contacts have also been put under quarantine. A comprehensive contact-tracing exercise has been initiated for their co-travellers, family members and others and genome sequencing on other specimens is going on, the ministry said.
